item.title: Getting started with arangodb
item.description: Installation & Setup # These instructions are for a base install of Community Edition for local development purposes. Mac # (Official documentation is maintained here) 1. Install # Dependencies: Homebrew brew install arangodb If you don’t want Homebrew or otherwise prefer a binary, you can download it instead here. 2. Run # /usr/local/sbin/arangod & 3. Try it out # Open your browser and point to localhost:8529. Run arangosh in your shell.
